greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A003557, n divided by largest squarefree divisor of n.
comment: No negative terms among the first 2^20 terms. Is the sequence nonnegative?
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A003557(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: A003557(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 2]--); factorback(f); }; \\ From A003557
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2018
